design_system.name: QuickQueue Midnight Luxury
design_system.description: A premium, high-contrast dark mode aesthetic designed for nightlife, events, and exclusive experiences. Uses deep slate backgrounds with electric indigo and amber accents.

universal_guidelines: Always use 'Playfair Display' for H1-H3 headings to maintain the luxury feel.
Never use pure black (#000000) for backgrounds; use Slate-950 (#020617) for depth.
Interactive elements must have a 'glow' effect on hover, not just a color change.
Use generous padding (p-8+) inside cards to let content breathe.
All images must have a subtle overlay (bg-black/20) to ensure text readability.
Use 'backdrop-blur-xl' for all floating elements (navbars, modals, toasts).
Animations should be slow and smooth (duration-500 or duration-700).
Do not use gradients for text; keep text solid white or slate-300 for legibility.
Forms should feel 'hollow' (transparent bg with border) rather than 'filled' (solid bg).
instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the design system strictly. Start by setting up the global CSS variables in index.css to match the color palette. Install 'Playfair Display' and 'Manrope' from Google Fonts. Use the provided image URLs for the respective sections. For the dashboard, switch to a slightly denser layout but keep the dark theme consistency.
